name: Allied WWII Base Defense - Anti-Tank and Aircraft Simulator Game FREE
name_original: Allied WWII Base Defense - Anti-Tank and Aircraft Simulator Game FREE
description:
Take control of high powered WWII weaponry in this intense historical battle game. Fight both Tanks and warplanes in destroyed cities as you strategically protect your base from Axis advancement. Survive wave after wave of assaulting forces. Shoot rockets at incoming flying aircraft to blast them out of the sky. Earn cash and upgrade your gun. Buy new weapons and become the hero of the war! Do you have what it takes

Features
-Realistic 3D graphics
-3 Unique Battlefields
-Several different weapons
-Realistic explosions
-Shoot enemy tanks and planes
